description: Introducing Grayson Hurst in his video debut. Grayson is one of thoseguys with a firm hairy torso, Tom Vacarro-like. More of a sports jockthan a muscle god, Grayson reminds us of Jeff Allen (the legendaryhairy star of Raiders of the Lost Arse). Grayson hasRaging Stallion written all over him! He does an excellent job in hisfirst film appearance. He is guaranteed to delight!
title: Studs
